mapper.select: WITH user_interactions AS ( SELECT DISTINCT f.feed_id AS feed_id FROM feeds f LEFT JOIN feed_likes fl ON f.feed_id = fl.feed_id AND fl.user_id = #{userId} LEFT JOIN feed_bookmarks fb ON f.feed_id = fb.feed_id AND fb.user_id = #{userId} WHERE fl.feed_id IS NOT NULL OR fb.feed_id IS NOT NULL ) SELECT fh.hashtag_id, COUNT(*) as count FROM user_interactions ui JOIN feed_hashtags fh ON ui.feed_id = fh.feed_id GROUP BY fh.hashtag_id ORDER BY count DESC
